verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I know that my redeemer lives What comfort that sentence gives He lives, He lives, who once was dead He lives, my Ever Living Head{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives triumphant from the grave He lives eternally to save He lives my mansion to prepare He lives to lead me safely there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives and grants me daily breath He lives and I shall conquer death He lives and while He lives I’ll sing He lives my Prophet, Priest and King{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He lives all glory to His name He lives my Jesus still the same Oh, the sweet joy this sentence gives I know that my redeemer lives.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My shepherd will supply my need: Jehovah is His name; In pastures fresh He makes me feed, Beside the living stream. He brings my wandering spirit back When I forsake His ways, And leads me, for His mercy’s sake, In paths of truth and grace.{/lang-eng}

v9
